description: This file defines the NoteDetailActivity class for managing note details within an Android app. It handles creating, editing, and saving notes, interacting with the Note and NoteRepository classes, and managing UI elements like toolbar, edit texts, and save button.

classes.name: NoteDetailActivity
classes.description: Activity for displaying and editing details of a note in the Android note-taking app.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up UI, retrieves or creates a Note instance, and sets up save button listener.

methods.name: onOptionsItemSelected
methods.description: Handles menu item selections, including navigating back when home button is pressed.

methods.name: saveNote
methods.description: Validates input fields, updates the Note object, and saves it via the NoteRepository, then finishes the activity.
